pkgmetadata.longdescription: Project Multidimensional Data in 2D Space // An implementation of the radviz projection in R. It enables the visualization of multidimensional data while maintaining the relation to the original dimensions. This package provides functions to create and plot radviz projections, and a number of summary plots that enable comparison and analysis. For reference see Ankerst et al. (1996) http://citeseer.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/summary?doi=10.1.1.68.1811 for original implementation, see Di Caro et al. (2010) DOI:10.1007/978-3-642-13672-6_13 for the original method for dimensional anchor arrangements.
